casebody.data:
Lutze HAHNE
v.
John F. HANZEL.
Willie M. Easterwood and Raymond Monroe
v.
Daniel Bauguess; Invincashield, Inc.; and John F. Hanzel. No. 9P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 24, 2004. Douglas Vreeland, Allan R. Gitter, Winston-Salem, for Hahne, Easterwood, and Monroe. E. Fitzgerald Parnell, III, Rebecca B. Wofford, Charlotte, for Hanzel.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th day of January 2004 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th day of June 2004."
